issue.title: [Doc][C++] Document threading model
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14702](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14702). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should document the threading model that the C++ implementation uses (and reference these docs from the python/r docs).

In particular, we can explain the CPU thread pool and the I/O thread pool, the differences between them, and the various controls for configuring these things.
